name: Damit!
description:
Bob the Beaver is in trouble, and he needs your help! Collect sticks to repair the dam, but watch out! Debris is coming to ruin your day, survive as long as possible before you get washed away! Our high score is 60, see if you can beat us!

Alex Bellotti                  - World Building, Lighting, 3D modelling

Cheyenne Maher         - 2D environment art, Texture art, UI

Aden Manning             - 3D character art/ 3d Modelling

Drennen Millar             - Game Design & Development, Programming

Euan Wynne-Jones     - UI design, Pixel art, Sound design
